document.full_text: former illinois governor rod blagojevich said on monday that he wanted the chicago tribune to fire writers who were critical of him, while he was helping the paper structure a deal connected with the sale of the chicago cubs.
document.title: former illinois governor wanted reporters fired
lines_and_colors: former illinois governor rod blagojevich said on monday that he wanted the chicago tribune to fire writers who were critical of him, while he was helping the paper structure a deal connected with the sale of the chicago cubs.
